feed.title: Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 7:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: WSW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early in the evening. Blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
